entry.title: Softbody Physics Prototype: A Real-Time XPBD Tire Simulation

link.title: Softbody Physics Prototype: A Real-Time XPBD Tire Simulation

entry.summary: This project demonstrates a real-time open-source deformable tire simulation engine implemented in TypeScript, using an adaptation of the Extended Position-Based Dynamics (XPBD) method. The formulation follows the model introduced by Macklin, M√ºller, and Chentanez (2016) in their paper ‚ÄúXPBD: Position-Based Simulation of Compliant Constrained Dynamics.‚Äù The simulation models a soft-body, air-f...

entry.title: YouTube TV Desktop w/ adblock
entry.summary: YouTube TV Simple YouTube TV Client for desktop based on electron. You can connect a compatible device such as a phone or computer with Google Chrome and send videos to the app for viewing, just like on ChromeCast or smart TVs with YouTube. Includes ad and telemetry blocking out of the box. It implements a DIAL server (based in SSDP) to allow connection from devices that use this same proto...

entry.title: Adonalsium Adjacency matrix web visualization
entry.summary: Adonalsium is a project designed to map the intricate relationships within Brandon Sanderson‚Äôs Cosmere universe. Inspired by the Network of Thrones, this project visualizes the connections between characters, locations, and events across the various books and series that make up the Cosmere.
